title: Beintehaa
overview: Zain, a charming brat, and Aaliya, a cultured and pretty girl, have been rival cousins since childhood. Eventually, when they grow up and meet each other after several years, Aaliya mistakens Zain for Zeeshan, her fianc√©. This creates a series of misunderstandings and finally Zain and Aaliya are forced into a marriage. Zain wants to get rid of her as he never wanted get married and only wanted to have girlfriends.
